title: WEDNESDAY 2/24 - Big Ben is expected to return to the Steelers and the franchise tag window opens
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY 2/24 - Big Ben is expected to return to the Steelers and the franchise tag window opens
description:
Ben Roethlisberger is willing to adjust his contract to return to Pittsburgh for the 2021 season. Dallas wants to do a long term deal with Dak Prescott, but is willing to franchise tag him for a second straight year. Super Bowl champion Chris Godwin has a decision to make as free agency approaches. New Falcons general manager Terry Fontenot says all options are on the table with the 4th overall pick in the draft. Bills cornerback Josh Norman gives his thoughts on his future in with or without Buffalo and Alex Smith revealed his return to the starting lineup "threw a wrench" in the teams plans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
